website_summaries.verdict: Protective shoe cover that adds a safety overshoe, protecting the toe area from accidental impact.
pros: The best shoe cover for environments with a strict steel toe cap requirement
cons: A niche product for specific construction and safety use

customer_reviews.title: My steel toe sandals
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 8.5 so I got medium. The fit great on my tennis. Feet are not all smashed. Love'em
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda lewis

customer_reviews.title: Easier install and longer lasting design
customer_reviews.text: I work in a retail environment that requires steel toe shoes. Steel toe shoes are not known for their comfort, actually, they are known more for their lack of comfort. I know that these are billed as a temporary safety measure, something that guests would wear as their visiting your facility. But I can tell you that I use these as my primary safety shoe, 5 days a week, 12 hours a day. The new design is more adaptable to different shoe types and sizes also making them longer lasting. I typically get 4 to 8 months worth of use out of them before replacing them.
customer_reviews.author: SirDubbith

customer_reviews.title: Good product for intermittent trips to the factory.
customer_reviews.text: I work as a physical therapist consulting for factories. I'm out on the floor a lot and normally just wear my steel toes. One of my sites bought these for guests and I've used them for when I forget boots or have a guest. These fit firmly and don't clomp around noisily as others I've used so I bought a pair to keep in my truck for unexpected need. Only issue I see is that the straps can break away from the shoe and then you are stuck with no way to hold them on.
customer_reviews.author: richard dekok

customer_reviews.title: Used inside a walking boot.
customer_reviews.text: I had to figure out a way to be able to work my job with a fractured ankle. I'm required to wear steel toes at work. I was able to wear these over my toe inside the walking boot. Worked out great!!
customer_reviews.author: Hollowangel0313

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! My husband uses them at facilities he visits when a pair of steel toes are needed. He keeps them in his car so that he can easily sleep them on to meet companies safety requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit the shoe size it claimed to fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this size since it was claimed that they fit size 13 shoes. I was originally going to use these over some hiking boots but those were too big for almost any of these slip on steel toes. Then I tried using them over a set of sizes 13 tennis shoes and they were much too small for that. I had to use them so I just sucked it up for the 30 minutes I had to use them but they were not comfortable to walk with.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: Cant wear steel toe shoes bc uncomfortable. These are great to use when you need to protect your toes. Easily remove when not needed. Boss would like some for other carpenters.
customer_reviews.author: melissa allen

customer_reviews.title: Not happy about return policy
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described. I put them aside to shop for a shoe to wear with them. Unfortunately My work informed everyone in a meeting that these cannot be worn at my facility. It is now only few days past the return period. So I’m stuck with 42.00 that I cannot wear.
customer_reviews.author: princess

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that my husband is pleased with this product. He wears them for 12 hours at a time. They do wear out but he has patched them. We will keep them on hand at all times due to the fact that they make his life so much more comfortable at work. We are pleased
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: Good protectors
customer_reviews.text: The first pair one of the straps tore off within 2 weeks. That pair fit my shoes perfectly. I returned those an got another. The new pair are a little smaller. I have not changed shoes. It’s been about a month now and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: who

customer_reviews.title: Love these, they work great
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they work great. I wear a size 9 shoe and these fit perfectly. I did try the white pair but they were to small. Exchanging them was super easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: does what its saposed to
customer_reviews.text: not really much to say other than it does its job. I work in a factory that requires steel toe protection and I've been using these for almost 3 years now and I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: They are a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like them very much. Its hard to tell they are attached to your shoes
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: remember that you have to think about what shoes will work with these for maximum comfort
customer_reviews.text: Got these to wear at work. Works better than safety shoes
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this item twice in less than a year, they are not durable at all. The rubber seems to be thin and wears out really quickly. I don’t think I will buy a third pair....
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Norfleet

customer_reviews.title: Nice to be able to change shoes and still have ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son. Product was as described. Nice to be able to change shoes and still have the steel toes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 2 months. For the money, would think should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: tdrose

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thw size was not what i expected the medium was too big for wemens sz 8
customer_reviews.author: leticia delgado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so much more comfortable than the full shoe cover. My heels dont feel squashed into the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby likes them!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes them. Wears them to work everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were too big, how can i return them ...
customer_reviews.text: They were too big,how can i return them for the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Shangy  Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than steel toe boots, but the strap broke after a week of wearing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it is what I was looking for - ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is what I was looking for - its a standard PPE item and yes it meet expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The strap to hold the safety toe on broke after 2 weeks they did work ok until that happened
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kamlager

customer_reviews.title: Good, but don't last for very long
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can wear these with my running shoes at work, but they will rip your shoe. I wrap hair nets around the toes of my Brooks running shoes & it solved the ripping problem. They have worn out and cracked within 7 months of me buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Nickie

product_meta.title: Impacto T2GUM Toes2Go Protective Safety Boot and Shoe Covers, Medium, Red
product_meta.description: The TOES2GO protects the toe area from accidental impact, crushing or stubbing. Ideal for any working environment that carries a risk of toe damage or has a steel toe cap requirement. Perfect for visitors, casual or temporary workers, management, clerical and sales people. The TOES2GO fit over all types of footwear providing a solid protecting cap. Can be comfortably worn over dress shoes, running shoes, most boots and even shoes with a heel. Affordable alternative to footwear with built-in steel toe cap. 100% waterproof. CE Certified SATRA M 21/ Toes2Go Medium fits Shoes Sizes Men 8-13 & Women's 10-13.
feature_bullets: Impacto safety overshoe protects the toe area from accidental impact, crushing or stubbing
Recommended for use in environments that have a steel toe cap requirement
Perfect for visitors, casual or temp workers
Toes2Go fit over all types of footwear - running shoes, most boots and shoes with a heel
Made with flexible, pliable PVC, 100% waterproof, will not harden, stiffen or crack with treads on sole to prevent slipping

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars78 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
